titles: Spiritual songs, or, Songs of praise to Almighty God upon several occasions Together with the Song of Songs which is Solomons: [F]irst turn'd, then par[ap]hrased in English verse. To which may be added, Penitential cries.
author: Mason, John, 1646?-1694.
publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst, at the Bible and Three Crowns, at the lower end of Cheap-side, near Mercers Chappel,
notes: Attributed to John Mason by Wing.
"Dives and Lazarus" has caption title and separate pagination; the register is continuous.
Running title reads: The song of songs which is Solomons.
With two final leaves of advertisements.
Title page is stained and torn, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  O.T. --  Song of Solomon --  Paraphrases, English --  Early works to 1800.
